p:
FRAP was determined according to the assay of Benzie and Strain
52 with modification. FRAP reagent was prepared by mixing 300 mM acetate buffer pH 3.6, 10 mM TPTZ in 40 mmol HCl, and 20 mmol FeCl 3 in the ratio of 10:1:1 (v/v/v). One hundred µl O. aristatus ethanol extract was added to 300 µl of FRAP reagent in the 96-well microplate (Costar-USA). After incubation at 37 °C, the absorbance was measured using the microplate reader (BMG Labtech, Germany) at 593 nm. Antioxidant activity was expressed as µmol Trolox Equivalent (TE/g DW).
